MajaFedorko.name: Maja Fedorko
MajaFedorko.quote: Jacob is very active and engaged. He reliably performs the tasks assigned to him. He actively participates in team meetings, willingly shares his ideas and acquired knowledge. He demonstrates very high analytical and communication skills. The solutions he delivers are of good quality and are documented.
MajaFedorko.title: Senior IT Manager, Internal-Firm Services, PwC Poland

EliasHohl.name: Elias Hohl
EliasHohl.quote: Since last year, Jakub Niewczas has been working as a junior developer on the Finomena Research Toolkit. I can confirm that his Python skills are way above average for his age. I also like his work attitude; he has been very persistent in his performance and efforts. He has already collected a considerable amount of experience and knows how to independently approach new problems in order to find a solution. Jakub Niewczas is also actively helping newer developers in my team with his knowledge. I enjoy working with him and his help is a notable alleviation for me in these stressful times. I can warmly recommend to accept him for a machine learning focused internship.
EliasHohl.title: CEO â€“ CryptoSearchTools, Manager & Cybersecurity advisor
